CmdLine: apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y libnss-ldap &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: file="/etc/nsswitch.conf" && 	echo 'passwd:         files ldap' > $file && 	echo 'group:          files ldap' >> $file && 	echo 'shadow:         files ldap' >> $file && 	echo 'gshadow:        files' >> $file && 	echo '' >> $file && 	echo 'hosts:          files dns' >> $file && 	echo 'networks:       files' >> $file && 	echo '' >> $file && 	echo 'protocols:      db files' >> $file && 	echo 'services:       db files' >> $file && 	echo 'ethers:         db files' >> $file && 	echo 'rpc:            db files' >> $file && 	echo '' >> $file && 		echo 'netgroup:       nis' >> $file
Commands.Name: run
